messages.content: Good article. It's sort of like FB friend recommendations but in-game. Is it necessary though? I think I've used the FB friend recommendation thing once? twice? and the rest of the time added people after having some good interactions with them. But I have good interactions with lots of people on FB but never add them as friends. It feels like they are trying to insulate players from interpersonal conflict and you can do that to an extent but I prefer the old Block button lol
I think FB friend recommendations would work terribly in games (at least I think). Our approach on that front is different, although, can't state much more.
